page.title: 04HORLICKS DAIRY-ROOKSBRIDGE
page.content:
WE VISITED HORLICKS DAIRY,WE FOUND OUT THAT THERE ARE SIXTY FIVE PEOPLE WORKING THERE AND IT HAS TWO MANAGERS. THE MILK COMES FROM SEVENTY EIGHT FARMS,APPROXIMATELY SEVENTY NINE THOUSAND LITRES IS BROUGHT TO THE DAIRY BY TANKERS EACH DAY.THE TANKERS HAVE TO BE WEIGHED EACH TIME THEY ARRIVE INTO THE DAIRY,ONE TANKER CARRIES EIGHT THOUSAND LITRES.THE MILK IS THEN PUT IN TWO BIG TANKS WHICH HOLD EIGHTY LITRES. THERE ARE TWO TANKS,ONE IS FILLEDTHE OTHER IS LEFT EMPTY.THE MILK WILL THEN BE CHECKED FOR SMELL AND TASTE.MILK CAN BE REJECTED FOR THE SLIGHTEST FAULT.
CONTINUED ON THE NEXT PAGE.
